info.description: API for SiB Colombia Catalogue. This API is used as a backend for consult the information of the species records reported in the SiB Colombia.
info.title: SiB Colombia - Catalogue API

tags.name: record
tags.description: This API works against the SiB Colombia Records data store, which store all species records registered through Mamut editor.

tags.name: taxonRecordName
tags.description: A operation related with the element TaxonRecordName

tags.name: AssociatedParty
tags.description: A operation related with the element AssociatedParty

get.description: get a list of records
get for last 5 updated records (scientificName and Id)
get a ordered number of updated records (scientificName and Id)

parameters.name: numberRecords
parameters.description: the number of records in the result

get.description: get for last 5 updated records (scientificName and Id)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: the page in the collection of Records

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: size limit in the result of Records

get.description: get the latest version of a record
get the latest version of a record
Returns Records according to query parameters

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: If is a query to count number of documents founded.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. This can't be greater than 1000.

get.description: Returns Records according to query parameters

parameters.name: multimedia
parameters.description: search for multimedia type in ancillaryDataApprovedInUse.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: If is a query to count number of documents founded.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. This can't be greater than 1000.

get.description: get the latest version of a record using the id in the Catalogue V1

post.description: Creates a new  Record with a taxonRecordNameVersion, that is the fisrt element and version of the created record.

get.description: Returns a taxonRecordNameVersion by Record id and number of version
Returns a list of TaxonRecordNameVersion with state "to_review"
Returns the taxonRecordNameVersion approved_in_use

put.description: Update a TaxonRecordNameVersion state to approved_in_use

post.description: Save a new taxonRecordNameVersion related with the a record with the id
Save a new taxonRecordNameVersion related with the record with the id

get.description: Returns the taxonRecordNameVersion approved_in_use
